summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1650, for the improvement of Third Avenue, from James Street to Pike Street in the City of Seattle, by grading the same and constructing concrete sidewalks eighteen (18) feet in width thereon, under Ordinance No. 17452 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
